tests.title: it should be able to register that user
tests.fullTitle: User registration Given a non-existing user it should be able to register that user
tests.code:
done => {
utils.request(endpoint, user)
.then(res => {
expect(res.code).to.equal(201)
expect(res.result.id).to.be.ok()
expect(res.result.token).to.be.ok()
expect(res.result.username).to.equal(user.username)
expect(res.result.createdAt).to.be.below(Date.now())
expect(Object.keys(res.result).length).to.equal(4)
done()
})
.catch(done)

tests.title: it should return an error if a wrong username is provided
tests.fullTitle: User registration Given a non-existing user it should return an error if a wrong username is provided
tests.code:
done => {
utils.request(endpoint, Object.assign({}, user, { username: "KtorZ" + invalidExt }))
.then(res => {
expect(res.code).to.equal(400)
return utils.mongo(db => db.collection('users')
.count({ username: user.username + invalidExt })
.then(res => {
expect(res).to.equal(0)
done()
}))
})
.catch(done)

return utils.mongo(db => db.collection('users')
.count({ username: user.username })

expect(res).to.equal(0)
done()
}))
})
.catch(done)

passes.fullTitle: User registration Given a non-existing user it should be able to register that user
passes.code:
done => {
utils.request(endpoint, user)
.then(res => {
expect(res.code).to.equal(201)
expect(res.result.id).to.be.ok()
expect(res.result.token).to.be.ok()
expect(res.result.username).to.equal(user.username)
expect(res.result.createdAt).to.be.below(Date.now())
expect(Object.keys(res.result).length).to.equal(4)
done()
})
.catch(done)

utils.request(endpoint, Object.assign({}, user, { username: "KtorZ" + invalidExt }))
.then(res => {
expect(res.code).to.equal(400)
return utils.mongo(db => db.collection('users')
.count({ username: user.username + invalidExt })
.then(res => {
expect(res).to.equal(0)
done()
}))
})
.catch(done)
